title: The “Your Word is Your Bond” Edition
description:
David Plotz, Emily Bazelon and John
Dickerson discuss the royalty and the squires of the Republican
Convention and they consider the work place norms of Fox News in
light of allegations of sexual misconduct, recently brought against
longtime Fox CEO Roger Ailes.
